content: to belly seam from the marker/ end of short row shaping to the front seam marker - ref fig 9 join dotted lines a to b remove the front seam markers a join hind leg to lower belly seams b working on one hind leg at a time with ws together match the rear end marker to the top of the foot at the beginning of the top of the foot seam work mattress stitch to join the small seam from the rear end marker/ top of the foot to the front of hind fig 9 leg marker adding toy filling before completing both seams - ref fig 10 join dotted lines these are the short note keep the stuffing light around the hind leg area it helps with the standing row stitches remove the front of hind leg markers join front hind leg seams for the last body seam working on one leg at a time lift up the leg and join the inner hind leg cast on edge to the lower belly near the rear end marker - ref fig 11 join dotted lines remove the rear end marker roo page 16 roo page 17 foot detail you ll notice the legs and feet are slightly akimbo at the moment this is simply rectified as followed working on one foot at a time secure a yarn needle that s threaded-up with yarn a bring the yarn out at the rear end near the back of the foot then make a stitch and join the inner foot near the heel to this rear end stitch and make a couple more small neat stitches to secure the foot in this position - ref figs 12 join x to y 13 & 14 once both feet have been adjusted in this way roo should stand unaided top of the foot seam fig 10 x y fig 12 tail opening fig 13 the join is here fig 11 fig 14 roo page 18 roo page 19 tail i-cord row 8 rs facing slide the 3 sts off the right-hand needle onto the point of the tail is picked up and knitted into the tail cast-off edge at roo s back as the left-hand needle pull the working yarn behind the back of the work ready to follows knit and knit all 3 sts return to the tail cast-off edge at the back cut yarn and thread the tail end through the 3 sts pull up to close the end and with the back facing you head towards you with yarn a begin at the right side weave the tail end back into the i-cord the cast-off edge and pick up and knit 6 sts into the cast-off edge from right to join tail seam left ref fig 15 pick up and knit from a to b join the row ends and the top of the tail with mattress stitch then join the under row 1 increase cast on 3 sts for under
